actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to broaden the exemption for common carriers and communications companies from the telephone excise tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the exemption for common carriers and communications companies from the telephone excise tax to include the use of all toll telephone service (present law exempts only the use of telephone service for which a flat amount or periodic charge is made).

titles.title: A bill to broaden the exemption for common carriers and communications companies from the telephone excise tax.
